name: G-Max Wind Rage
effect: The Flying-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Airstream while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Remove all Barriers (ie. Light Screen, Reflect), Entry Hazards (Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, etc.), and Terrains (Misty Terrain, Electric Terrain, etc.) from the battlefield.
description: The user creates a wind so strong it clears any fog and barriers from the entire battlefield.
